name: Forest Of Memories (Bowser51333)
description:
This is my submission to the Ludum Dare 48 Compo competition. This was a lot of fun to make, even though it isn't much. You must travel through this seemingly endless forest to gather your memories. Find the 12 notes scattered near important memories and feelings and find the way out. I hope you enjoy and stick around for more of my games, I have some others in the works. 

All game data other than the font used was created in the past 48 hours. 

Thank you, 

Midwest Games
